section.title: sin function
section.para: Returns the sine of the argument.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The sin function calculates the sine of an angle z, which may be in radians or degrees depending on the current settings. z may be any numeric expression that evaluates to a real number or a complex number. If z is a real number, the result will be in the range -1 to 1.

simplesect.title: Remarks
simplesect.para: For arguments with a large magnitude, the function will begin to lose precision.
